H0.text: Isoprene, Butyl and Nitrile are all types of which substance. Plastic

H1.text: Isoprene, Butyl and Nitrile are all types of which substance. Polymer

H2.text: Isoprene, Butyl and Nitrile are all types of which substance. Adhesive

H3.text: Isoprene, Butyl and Nitrile are all types of which substance. Rubber

A4.text: Butyl rubber is a synthetic rubber.

A5.text: Butyl rubber is a synthetic rubber, a copolymer of isobutylene with isoprene.

A6.text: Nitrile rubber, also known as nitrile butadiene rubber, NBR, Buna-N, and acrylonitrile butadiene rubber, is a synthetic rubber derived from acrylonitrile (ACN) and butadiene.

A7.text: Nitrile rubber is used in the automotive and aeronautical industry to make fuel and oil handling hoses, seals, grommets, and selfâ€‘sealing fuel tanks.
